meanings.definition: The act of making something basic or alkaline.
meanings.sent1: Her basifications of the soil helped the plants grow better.
meanings.sent2: The basifications of the solution turned it from acidic to neutral.
meanings.sent3: The basifications of the cake batter made it rise beautifully in the oven.
meanings.sent4: His basifications of the team's strategy transformed their performance.
meanings.sent5: The basifications of the water made it safe to drink.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming basic or alkaline.
meanings.sent1: The gradual basifications of the lake water supported aquatic life.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the basifications of the soil improved its fertility.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected basifications of the pool water surprised the swimmers.
meanings.sent4: The basifications of her thoughts led to a more positive outlook.
meanings.sent5: The basifications of the ocean transformed its ecosystem.
